DOC.brief_summary: A study YM155 treatment unresectable stage III metastatic stage IV melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Treatment Unresectable Stage III Metastatic Stage IV Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: A phase II , multicenter , open-label study subject unresectable Stage III metastatic ( Stage IV ) Melanoma evaluate efficacy safety YM155
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm unresectable stage III IV malignant melanoma Life expectancy > 12 week History malignancy last 5 year Major surgery within past 21 day
